name: OrelHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights”
”Alexa, dim the bedroom lights to 50%”
”Alexa, change the color of the dining room lights to blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
OrelHome is a home automation solution that allows you to monitor and control a variety of connected devices. OrelHome devices range from smart lighting to appliances and everything in between. The OrelHome application lets you add devices to your account, fully control and monitor different device parameters, and create a recipe for automation that works perfectly for you. 
This skill provides yet another way to control connected devices – voice commands

Get Started
After enabling the skill, simply login to the OrelHome app and try out a few voice commands.
